          <title>
            <string language="hu">A populációk jellemzői</string>
            <string language="en">Characteristics of populations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eigenschaften der Bevölkerungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractéristiques des populations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Características das populações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche delle popolazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηριστικά των πληθυσμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características de poblaciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A populációk jellemzése - egyedszám, növekedés, koreloszlás, környezeti igény</string>
            <string language="en">Characterization of populations - number, growing, age-division, environmental claim</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ökológia,  populációbiológia,  demográfia,  </string>
            <string language="en">ecology, population-biology, demography</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichnung der Bevölkerungen - Zahl, 
wachsend, Alter-Abteilung, Klimaanspruch</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caracterização das populações - número,

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione delle popolazioni - numero, 
crescente, età-divisione, reclamo ambientale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηρισμός των πληθυσμών - αριθμός, ανάπτυξη, 
ηλικία-τμήμα, περιβαλλοντική αξίωση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caracterización de poblaciones - número, 
creciendo, edad-divisio'n, demanda ambiental</string>

          <keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
